sourcing.instructions: Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online vendor specializing in rare earth metals.
steps: Erbium: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online vendor specializing in rare earth metals.
1. Measure 10.0g of Erbium using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Allow the crucible to cool gradually in the furnace to prevent thermal shock, maintaining a temperature of approximately 400째C (752째F) for 1 hour.
